prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Pipe, Drums, Guitar, Bass, but without Piano.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features the Pipe, Drums, Guitar, and Bass, but no Piano.

Style 2:
This song is composed of the Pipe, Drums, Guitar, and Bass, but Piano is absent.

Style 3:
The Pipe, Drums, Guitar, and Bass are all present in this song, but the Piano is not.
